entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Thurrand is a land of foresight and long term thinking, which makes of the inhabitants tend towards lawful alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Thurrandic Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Thurrandic, and either High or Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Thurrandic Insight
entries: Those who grow up in Thurrand know that insights that are gained from long and careful thought. At level 1 you can ritually cast {@spell Identify} once a day. At level 3 you can ritually cast {@spell Augury} once a day. At level 7 you can ritually cast {@spell Divination} once a day. Your spellcasting ability for these is {@ability Wisdom}.
